name: Free Online INI YAML JSON Converter - ATools
description: Free online INI/YAML/JSON converter with basic validation and copy output. Runs locally in your browser.
seoDescription: Free online INI/YAML/JSON converter that converts between INI, YAML, and JSON, with basic format validation and one-click copy output. Everything runs locally in your browser with zero uploads, ideal for config migrations and quick debugging.

ui.description: Notes: Convert between INI/YAML/JSON with basic validation. INI supports “root keys + sections”; for deep nesting use YAML/JSON.
ui.errIniObjectOnly: INI only supports objects (key=value). Arrays or scalar values are not supported.
